definitions: the state of being isolated or detached

examples.text: I felt a sense of disconnection from the city environment
an ever-deepening disconnection between people and the natural world

shortDefinitions: state of being isolated or detached

definitions: the act of detaching one thing from another

examples.text: the player takes 15 seconds to reboot after disconnection from the PC

shortDefinitions: act of detaching one thing from another

definitions: termination of the connection of a household to water, electricity, gas, or phone

examples.text: protests over the disconnection of the water supply
threats of disconnection will follow unless the debt is settled

shortDefinitions: termination of connection of household to water, electricity, gas, or phone
